name: view setup
Setup View
info: This function node constructs the message that the view builder node accepts. To properly draw a line, the Indices field is required. In this simple case, the `isLinking` property is set to true, which means that since all linking indices are the same, the line will go through all four points in order.

name: Build View
info: This node creates the view GameObject in the scene. After its creation it can be retrieved with a get view node.

name: Apply Data
info: This node applies the XYZ positions, colors and indices from the view setup function to the view.
